product_name: Laura MercierLong-Wear Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy SPF 30 with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryThe Laura Mercier Long-Wear Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy SPF 30 with Hyaluronic Acid is the bestselling tinted moisturizer with a new & improved weightless formula that provides 16HR long wear, 24HR+ hydration and improves skin tone and texture.
details: DetailsBenefits16HR long wearImproves skin tone and texture with every wear24HR+ hydrationHumidity proofSPF30 protectionReduces Appearance of Pores and Fine Lines ResurfacedNon-ComedogenicNon-AcnegenicDermatologist TestedKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid- Long-lasting hydrationUpcycled Grape Extract with Resveratrol- Softens appearance of fine linesProbiotic Complex- Strengthens skin barrierResearch Results100% agree it visibly evens skin tone and texture after 1 Day**100% agree it makes their skin feel soft in just 1 week *97% agree it reveals healthy looking skin over time**Consumer study of 30 panelists at independent laboratory**Clinical study of 30 panelists at independent laboratoryItem 2633114How To UseHOW TO APPLY:Dispense Tinted Moisturizer on the back of your hand and use it as a palette.Picking up a small amount from back of the hand, apply with fingers, smoothing over face in a downward motion to ensure facial hairs lay flat.Laura recommends starting at the outer portion of the face and working inwards toward the nose, avoiding excess application around the contours of the face.Pat on additional product to build coverage where needed.Laura's finishing touch, inspired by a Parisian facial technique, is to smooth the remaining product under the jawline, neck, and chin.PRO TIPS:To build more coverage, pick up product on the back of hand using a foundation brush and work Tinted Moisturizer into the bristles on a clean area on back of the hand. Stipple onto any areas that need additional coverage.If a fuller coverage is desired, mix a few drops of foundation into Tinted Moisturizer to get more pigment while maintaining the fresh, hydrated look of Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy.IngredientsWater, Dicaprylyl Ether, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Tribehenin, Glycerin, Silica, Magnesium Stearate, Sodium Potassium Aluminum Silicate, Butylene Glycol, Magnesium Sulfate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Zinc Stearate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Mica, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice, Maltodextrin, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, Rosa Hybrid Flower Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Lactobacillus. +/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir) Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: HOW TO APPLY:Dispense Tinted Moisturizer on the back of your hand and use it as a palette.Picking up a small amount from back of the hand, apply with fingers, smoothing over face in a downward motion to ensure facial hairs lay flat.Laura recommends starting at the outer portion of the face and working inwards toward the nose, avoiding excess application around the contours of the face.Pat on additional product to build coverage where needed.Laura's finishing touch, inspired by a Parisian facial technique, is to smooth the remaining product under the jawline, neck, and chin.PRO TIPS:To build more coverage, pick up product on the back of hand using a foundation brush and work Tinted Moisturizer into the bristles on a clean area on back of the hand. Stipple onto any areas that need additional coverage.If a fuller coverage is desired, mix a few drops of foundation into Tinted Moisturizer to get more pigment while maintaining the fresh, hydrated look of Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy.

reviews.headline: Great Coverage and No Cakey
reviews.comments: I've been using the Laura Mercier Long-Wear Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy SPF 30 with Hyaluronic Acid and it has quickly become my go-to for everyday skin. The formula feels so lightweight yet it gives just the right amount of coverage to even out my complexion while still looking natural and fresh. I love that it has SPF 30 built in for protection and the added hyaluronic acid keeps my skin feeling hydrated all day without looking greasy. It gives me that healthy dewy glow that looks like skin but better and it wears beautifully from morning until night without breaking apart. This is one of those products that makes me feel put together with minimal effort and I honestly don't want to be without it.

reviews.headline: I'd buy this again
reviews.comments: Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer gives a naturally flawless, "no-makeup" glow while hydrating skin and offering SPF 30. Lightweight, buildable, and easy to blend, it's perfect for everyday wear‚Äîjust prep dry areas to avoid any flakiness.

reviews.headline: So lightweight and blends well!
reviews.comments: Love this product. It's light weight. It blends well. I love that it has SPF and my face doesn't burn when I'm outside. They have a large variety of colors and shades!

reviews.headline: a must have for effortlessly glowing skin
reviews.comments: i am not a big foundation girlie however i am on my 3rd tube of this - its a multipurpose must have. provides my dry skin with a boost of hydration that lasts all day, goes on easily with fingers or brush (super beginner friendly) evens out my complexion covers redness, the texture is easy to blend and is buildable. best of all it has SPF to help protect skin from sun damage. leaves skin looking radiant and dewy with a skin like finish. its a holy grail to me.

reviews.headline: Long-Wear Tinted Moisturizer
reviews.comments: The tinted moisturizer blends really well. Its super creamy, not thick like some moisturizers. Its super light on my skin, it's moisturizing and it feels clean on my skin. The color and finish is gorgeous, it didn't oxidize after drying. It feels like im not wearing anything. You can build up the coverage if you need the extra coverage. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

reviews.headline: Perfect for summer
reviews.comments: This is one of the best tinted moisturizers I've used, perfect amount of coverage yet breathable to wear during warmer months! I just love the way this gives you a nice radiant finish without feeling like much on the skin!

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Tinted moisturizer works great. I like to use it on days where i dont really wana wear make up. I always set it with setting powder and it looks nice.

reviews.headline: I love how it evens out my skin
reviews.comments: This tinted moisturizer gives the perfect amount of coverage and dewyness to make my skin look healthy and even. It's just what I was looking for and the color match was perfect.

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: I wear tinted sunscreen year round. I have mature dry skin.  This product is a winner! Perfect shade. Doesn't creep, pill or flake. Even the packaging is great doesn't squirt a ton at once. Thank you Laura Mercier!

reviews.headline: My go-to for glowing skin in California sun!
reviews.comments: Living in sunny California, I need something that looks natural, feels light, and protects my skin ‚Äî and this tinted moisturizer checks all the boxes! I use it almost every day, and it's been amazing for my dry-combination skin. It gives a fresh, dewy finish without feeling greasy, and the SPF 30 is perfect for everyday wear. I've even featured it in a few of my Reels because it really gives that effortless glow. It blends beautifully, doesn't cling to dry spots, and keeps my skin hydrated all day. Love it for my daily no-makeup makeup look!

reviews.headline: Feels heavy and greasy
reviews.comments: This tinted moisturizer feels so heavy and greasy on the skin. I immediately returned it.

reviews.headline: Looks natural and long lasting
reviews.comments: I love the natural dewy finish. This stays on all day and leaves my skin looking flawless. It feels light on my skin and is easy to remove at the end of the day.

reviews.headline: Summer favs
reviews.comments: I adore the Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy SPF 30! It provides a perfect, luminous finish while hydrating my skin. The lightweight formula evens out my tone and offers great sun protection. It's ideal for a fresh, natural look that feels comfortable all day. Love it!

reviews.headline: New shades
reviews.comments: ORANGE!!!! The new shade range for this product has made the fairer shades very orange, the original shades were perfect this used to be my favorite product. Would NOT recommend the new product

reviews.headline: Obsessed!
reviews.comments: This is one of those effortless staples I always come back to. The coverage is light but buildable, giving just enough to even out my skin while still letting it breathe. It has a soft, dewy finish that makes my skin look fresh and healthy‚Äînever greasy. I love that it includes SPF 30 for daytime protection, and the formula blends beautifully with fingers or a brush. It's comfortable, hydrating, and perfect for those minimal makeup days where you still want to look put together.

reviews.headline: Great Light Product
reviews.comments: Great light coverage product.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: This is my go to skin tint. It layers well with other products and doesnt get cakey.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: It is very light coverage. Melts into my skin and also feels very light and moisturizing.

reviews.headline: Would NOT recommend
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this, but this product was SO BAD for my skin. Immediately caused me to breakout ALL over my face which is not normal for me. I like its texture and look of it, but it single-handedly ruined my skin. So disappointed and annoyed lol

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: This is seriously one of the best tinted moisturizers on the market! The coverage is amazing and wears so beautifully!

media.headline: Great Coverage
media.caption: Great Coverage that last all day

media.headline: My new favorite, can't live without foundation

faceoff_positive.comments:
**Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy Review**

I've been using the Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy for a few weeks now, and I have to say, it's quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. Compared to other tinted moisturizers I've tried in the past, this one stands out because it strikes a perfect balance between coverage and a natural finish. Many other tinted moisturizers can feel too heavy or leave a matte finish, but Laura Mercier's offering gives a radiant, dewy glow that feels light and breathable on the skin. 

One of the biggest benefits of owning this product is its versatility. It's incredibly easy to apply, even with your fingers, and the coverage is buildable without ever feeling cakey. On days when I want light coverage, it evens out my skin tone without masking it, and when I build it up, I get more of a medium coverage without the heaviness of foundation. The formula also includes SPF 30, which is a great bonus for everyday sun protection.

Another huge plus is the dewy finish‚Äîit gives your skin that healthy, luminous glow without looking oily, which is perfect for anyone with dry or dull skin. The moisturizing properties of this product keep my skin hydrated throughout the day, and I love how it stays fresh without needing to be touched up. 

Would I buy this product again? Absolutely. The results speak for themselves, and I appreciate how natural and glowy my skin looks after using it. If you're looking for a product that combines skincare and makeup seamlessly, this is a great option.

Lastly, I would definitely recommend the Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy to friends and family, especially those who want a light-to-medium coverage product that's easy to use and leaves a gorgeous, radiant finish. It's perfect for anyone who prefers a more natural, skin-like look but still wants a bit of coverage and hydration throughout the day.
faceoff_positive.headline: Light Glowing Coverage

faceoff_negative.comments:
I've been using this product for the past couple of weeks, and I must say, I feel pretty neutral about it.  I was hoping that it would wow me, but it didn't.  With that said, I think it would be great for someone with already perfect skin (no acne scars, active acne, rosacea, etc) who wants a tinted moisturizer that also acts as a sunscreen. It would be great for someone with dry or normal skin who isn't looking for much coverage. 

My skin is combination, dry in areas and oily in others, but usually pretty dry in the winter. I prep my skin with a good moisturizer and sunscreen prior to applying and I honestly can't say that I noticed much of a difference with it.  It didn't cover any of my rosacea or scars or anything. It also kind of settled in my pores a bit and started to accentuate them, even after setting it with the Laura Mercier translucent loose blurring powder. Also, I really wish Laura Mercier made shades that weren't so orange or pink; us olive girls need some love too.

The first picture is my skin before application and the 2nd picture is with it applied all over my face.
faceoff_negative.headline: Good for anyone wanting sheer coverage

rollup.name: Long-Wear Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy SPF 30 with Hyaluronic Acid
